channel.title: NPR Topics: Home Page Top Stories
channel.description: Top stories in the U.S. and world news, politics, health, science, business, music, arts and culture. Nonprofit journalism with a mission. This is NPR.

image.title: NPR Topics: Home Page Top Stories

item.title: Newly discovered dinosaur species was a fish-eater with a huge horn
item.description: The semi-aquatic dinosaur, Spinosaurus mirabilis, was discovered by an international team of scientists working in Niger.
item.content:encoded:
The semi-aquatic dinosaur, Spinosaurus mirabilis, was discovered by an international team of scientists working in Niger.

(Image credit: Matthew Irving)
item.dc:creator: Rebecca Hersher

item.title: Reporters' notebook: The Olympics closing ceremony is way more fun than you'd think
item.description: Olympics opening ceremonies tend to get more love than their closing counterparts. But a pair of NPR reporters who watched both in Italy left with a newfound appreciation for the latter.
item.content:encoded:
Olympics opening ceremonies tend to get more love than their closing counterparts. But a pair of NPR reporters who watched both in Italy left with a newfound appreciation for the latter.

(Image credit: Piero Cruciatti)
item.dc:creator: Rachel Treisman

item.title: A major winter storm hits the Northeast, with blizzard warnings in effect
item.description: New Jersey through Massachusetts could see 2 feet of snow. New York City's mayor said the city had not "seen a storm like this in a decade."
item.content:encoded:
New Jersey through Massachusetts could see 2 feet of snow. New York City's mayor said the city had not "seen a storm like this in a decade."

(Image credit: Ryan Murphy)
item.dc:creator: Chandelis Duster

item.title: Mexican army kills leader of Jalisco New Generation Cartel, official says
item.description: The Mexican army killed the leader of the powerful Jalisco New Generation Cartel, Nemesio Rubén Oseguera Cervantes, "El Mencho," in an operation Sunday, a federal official said.
item.content:encoded:
The Mexican army killed the leader of the powerful Jalisco New Generation Cartel, Nemesio Rubén Oseguera Cervantes, "El Mencho," in an operation Sunday, a federal official said.

(Image credit: Alejandra Leyva/AP)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: Ukraine's combat amputees cling to hope as a weapon of war
item.description: Along with a growing number of war-wounded amputees, Mykhailo Varvarych and Iryna Botvynska are navigating an altered destiny after Varvarych lost both his legs during the Russian invasion.
item.content:encoded:
Along with a growing number of war-wounded amputees, Mykhailo Varvarych and Iryna Botvynska are navigating an altered destiny after Varvarych lost both his legs during the Russian invasion.

(Image credit: Carol Guzy for NPR)
item.dc:creator: Carol Guzy

item.title: University students hold new protests in Iran around memorials for those killed
item.description: Iran's state news agency said students protested at five universities in the capital, Tehran, and one in the city of Mashhad on Sunday.
item.content:encoded:
Iran's state news agency said students protested at five universities in the capital, Tehran, and one in the city of Mashhad on Sunday.

(Image credit: Vahid Salemi)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: Pakistan claims to have killed at least 70 militants in strikes along Afghan border
item.description: Pakistan's military killed at least 70 militants in strikes along the border with Afghanistan early Sunday, the deputy interior minister said.
item.content:encoded:
Pakistan's military killed at least 70 militants in strikes along the border with Afghanistan early Sunday, the deputy interior minister said.

(Image credit: Hedayat Shah)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: Armed man is shot and killed at Mar-a-Lago, Palm Beach Sheriff says
item.description: The U.S. Secret Service says the man carried a gas can and shotgun before agents shot and killed him early Sunday morning.
item.content:encoded:
The U.S. Secret Service says the man carried a gas can and shotgun before agents shot and killed him early Sunday morning.

(Image credit: Julia Demaree Nikhinson/AP)
item.dc:creator: Luke Garrett

item.title: Golden again! U.S. tops Canada to win 1st men's hockey gold since 'Miracle on Ice'
item.description: The U.S. won its first Olympic gold in 46 years in a 2-1 overtime thriller over rival Canada. A brilliant performance by U.S. goaltender Connor Hellebuyck saved the Americans' chances.
item.content:encoded:
The U.S. won its first Olympic gold in 46 years in a 2-1 overtime thriller over rival Canada. A brilliant performance by U.S. goaltender Connor Hellebuyck saved the Americans' chances.

(Image credit: Bruce Bennett)
item.dc:creator: Becky Sullivan

item.title: PHOTOS: Your car has a lot to say about who you are
item.description: Photographer Martin Roemer visited 22 countries — from the U.S. to Senegal to India — to show how our identities are connected to our mode of transportation.
item.content:encoded:
Photographer Martin Roemer visited 22 countries — from the U.S. to Senegal to India — to show how our identities are connected to our mode of transportation.

(Image credit: Martin Roemers)
item.dc:creator: Kamala Thiagarajan
